targets.query: SELECT "bfd_nbr_ip" AS "Neighbour IP", "bfd_nbr_if" AS "Interface", "bfd_nbr_state" AS "State", "bfd_nbr_remote_state" AS "Remote State" FROM "autogen"."xe_bfd_nbrs" WHERE ("source" = 'de-fra20e-aws-sie-rg02') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source", "type" LIMIT 1

params: Remote State - 1 means UP,  0 means DOWN

targets.query: SELECT "bfd_nbr_ip" AS "Neighbour IP", "bfd_nbr_if" AS "Interface", "bfd_nbr_state" AS "State", "bfd_nbr_remote_state" AS "Remote State" FROM "autogen"."xe_bfd_nbrs" WHERE ("source" = 'de-fra20e-aws-sie-rg02') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source", "type" LIMIT 1

params: Remote State - 1 means UP,  0 means DOWN

targets.query: SELECT "bfd_nbr_ip" AS "Neighbour IP", "bfd_nbr_if" AS "Interface", "bfd_nbr_state" AS "State", "bfd_nbr_remote_state" AS "Remote State" FROM "autogen"."xe_bfd_nbrs" WHERE ("source" = 'de-fra20e-aws-sie-rg02') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source", "type" LIMIT 1

params: Remote State - 1 means UP,  0 means DOWN

targets.query: SELECT "bfd_nbr_ip" AS "Neighbour IP", "bfd_nbr_if" AS "Interface", "bfd_nbr_state" AS "State", "bfd_nbr_remote_state" AS "Remote State" FROM "autogen"."xe_bfd_nbrs" WHERE ("source" = 'de-fra20e-aws-sie-rg02') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source", "type" LIMIT 1

params: Remote State - 1 means UP,  0 means DOWN

panels.title: $device_tenant - BGP State - Established=1 any other state=0
$device_tenant - BGP Prefix Withdrawal Activity for VRF $vrf_tenant

targets.query: SELECT last("local_ip_addr") AS "Local_IP_Addr" FROM "autogen"."xe_crypto_oper_ikev2_sa" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device_tenant$/ AND "sa_id" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "neighbor_id" fill(null) LIMIT 1

list.definition: show tag values with key = "name"  where source =~ /^$device_tenant$/
list.label: Interface
list.name: interfaces_tenant
list.query: show tag values with key = "name"  where source =~ /^$device_tenant$/

list.definition: show tag values from xe_bgp_neigh_installpfx with key="vrf_name" where source =~ /^$device_tenant$/
list.label: VRF
list.name: vrf_tenant
